articles.author: Divyanshi Sharma
articles.title: Former Microsoft employee has only 60 days to find new job, says concerned about his kids - India Today
articles.description: An engineer, who was laid off from Microsoft recently, has 60 days to find a new role in the same company as he is on L1 visa. If he fails to do so, he, along with his entire family, will be deported.
